#summary Acknowledgements

Primary authors: Kevin Bourrillion, Jared Levy, Mike Bostock.

Google is a _very_ collaborative environment, and the "long tail" of Googlers who have contributed in a meaningful way to the library that you see here goes a long, long way.  If I tried to count every person who helped with a random bug fix, speedup, warning cleanup, new utility method, code review, or participating in the debate over the thorny design issue of the week -- I think I would probably hit three digits.

We appreciate the contributions of every one of these individuals even inasmuch as we could never attempt to list them all!
